website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality corded planer with a wide variety of innovative and experience-enhancing features.
pros: The front and rear shoes are precision machined after assembly for accuracy and the unit features a lock-off as well as a lock-on button for safety and ease of use
Additionally, the guide fence mounts to the front and back of the planer for additional stability
cons: The aluminum shoes are a little less durable than the rest of the machine and can be easily marred

customer_reviews.title: Works fine except the touching aluminum surface is too soft
customer_reviews.text: Works fine except the touching aluminum surface is too soft, gets scratched up from wood, just wood! Looks like I've used it on steel and metal surfaces, didn't expect that. Adjustment knob accurate but has 1/4 inch play. Well not the best for sure
customer_reviews.author: Walter Z

customer_reviews.title: ... but I generally trust Bosch to make a reasonably good quality tool and I wasn't disappointed with this one
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a power planner but I generally trust Bosch to make a reasonably good quality tool and I wasn't disappointed with this one. the dust extraction is pretty good with the standard dust bag setup though due to the nature of planing it generates a significant volume of material that will fill the bag quickly. The included guide and shoes are very helpful and adequately constructed to inspire confidence. With good technique to can avoid snipe pretty easily with this planner and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin H. Mossberg

customer_reviews.title: Another High Quality Bosch Tool
customer_reviews.text: First power planer purchase to neatly trim doors instead of using a circular saw and guide...very happy I bought this. Smooth, easy set up and operation, as with my other Bosch tools. Well balanced with plenty of power to handle planing hollow-core and solid-wood doors. Warmed up on scrap wood...took a few times to get my technique pat to smoothly finish the last ~4 inches of the door edge (after the front of the planer had nothing left to rest on). Finish looks like it was done in the factory.
customer_reviews.author: NOVA Guy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this planer for approximately one hour when it stopped working. After inspecting the planer, I noticed that the plastic screw that holds one of the motor brushes was loose and misaligned. I removed the brush which was bent with one leg falling off. Tried to replace brush but screw would not hold in plastic threads and brush holder was displaced causing motor to spark. The problem is the design of the motor brush holder is a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Build quality a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: A nice tool - plenty of power, good adjustments, and appreciate the switchable shaving exhaust feature. Use the product for planing doors and fitting replacement deck boards. The bevel slot is also very handy for putting a chamfer on railings etc. very quickly. As others mentioned the machining / polish on the shoe out of the box was a little disappointing - it was definitely not the mirror finish described in the manufacturers description and video. With visible tool marks & swirls etc. It was not bad enough to affect use of tool for my applications but when you pay Bosch prices you kind of expect a little more...
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: This planer comes with a bag which is nice but the problem is that the bag doesn't catch everlythin - at least 30% of the debris doesn't make it to the bag and is spit out all over the room. The entire room was covered in planer dust from top to bottom. Messy messy messy. And to make it even worse the guide is such a pain to assemble and attach to the planer. You have to assemble it every time you use it, takes a long time and is quite difficult -Not worth it. I thought bosch was good but I guess they are only good at making drill bits and stuff like that, not power tools.
customer_reviews.author: KEVEN J NIELSEN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool...glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my better tool purchases. I plane only hardwoods and the tool as well as the blades are holding up just fine. Regarding snipe...yes, you can have that happen but it's not the tools fault, more like operator error. I always add sacrificial pieces and I totally avoid snipe. As with any power tool, you need to pay attention when using it and focus on your work and the tool. If you follow tool instructions, you don't even need sacrificial pieces but it's kind of a safety net if you will. Practice on cheap lumber first to get the "feel" of the planer and you will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: What A Time-Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes off nice, smooth, even wood shavings. A little heavier than the Makita I used to use. Just easy and smooth. It makes mountains of wood shavings on the smallest projects! Makes my shop floor look like I was really doing something huge and important. I am the world's worst woodworker, but this planer makes it a bunch easier. I know nothing about power planers and this one did the job for me very well. Did I mention "smooth"?
customer_reviews.author: dyle51Top Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Little powerhouse planer
customer_reviews.text: This planer is a powerhouse. I set it up as a cheap bench top jointer for planing down 3” cedar pickets to use as railings. I have run over 380 feet of board surface across it (192' of pickets on both sides) in 3 days and this thing didn't even notice outside of a few minor blade Nick's from missed staples. Even the blade damage was miniscule for what I expected. The surface finish was awesome as well with an almost glossy smooth surface. If you're planing wood under 3.25", this thing would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: bloominonion

customer_reviews.title: Flooring contractor
customer_reviews.text: I use this to shave the bottom of solid hardwood... for instance I was installing 3/4 inch solid oak and there was a Simpson strong tie running the length of the room, I couldn't remove it so I planed the bottom of the boards to accommodate the height difference... Worked perfect! I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer and applier

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: How many reviews begin with the lament "I should have heeded the other reviews..." Other reviewers reported pitting on the sole of the planer. I erroneously thought that the problem could not affect performance and, in any case, surely would have been resolved by now by a company with Bosch's reputation. Not only was the sole plate of my planer pitted, but one corner of the plate had swirl marks from an earlier finishing step, indicating that the plate was not uniformly polished in the final finishing step because it was not flat.
customer_reviews.author: RexReed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic unit, great dust collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic planer. I love the dust collection system - I love that it’s round (so many planers use weird shapes!) and it’s quite convenient that I can switch the side of the dust ejection. I bought the VAC020 adapter with it and it works perfectly with my 2.5” shop vacuum. I’ve been using it to roughly prepare some fresh-sawn redwood slabs and there’s essentially zero dust from the unit when paired with my shop vac. The overall handling and performance have been great as well. I’m very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend to anyone looking for an electric planer.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: A great planer. It was very easy to use on ...
customer_reviews.text: A great planer. It was very easy to use on two exterior and one interior door. The cloth dust/chip collection bag works well. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NeilM

customer_reviews.title: Quality Planer
customer_reviews.text: The rail guide took me a bit of study to assemble properly, but it was not outrageously difficult to figure out. Once on, it allowed me to trim a cabinet spacer to be flush with the panel, and with no damage to the panel portion. I was impressed. I thought the last little bit would need to be done by hand with sandpaper. But the planer gave me a smooth, perfect edge.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Tool to flatten Lumber
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this planner to help flatten warped and twisted lumber for over 2 years and it has served me well. I make several light passes with this planner to remove the obvious high points on the board before using hand planes to finish the flattening job.
customer_reviews.author: One Pony Show

customer_reviews.title: Machining leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should I suppose but the machining of the shoe is terrible (See Photos).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed in BOSCH regarding design and quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this tool. the leading and following shoe surfaces are not level/parallel to the knives (blades) and regardless of what I do (feed with, against or across the grain and various feed rates) the resulting finish is not worthy of any planer. There is no provision to adjust the knives or the shoes prohibiting the tool to be adjusted. I am going to do my best to exchange for a planer from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jensen

customer_reviews.title: PERHAPS ONE OF THE BEST PLANERS IN THE MARKET
customer_reviews.text: IT GETS HIGH MARKS ON ALL AREAS, AND THE FENCE IS REALLY AWESOME. MY ONLY COMPLAINT IS THAT, EVEN THOUGH ADJUSTABLE (THE FENCE), IT HAS NO GRADUATIONS OR MARKS TO ALLOW YOU TO KNOW THAT ITS SQUARE WITH THE TOOL AT A GLANCE. YOU NEED TO USE A SQUARE TO MAKE SURE. OTHER THAN THAT, EVERYTHING ON THIS TOOL IS EXCELLENT, AND PRODUCES SUPERB RESULTS.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have been lost in the trenches for years not fully understanding the use of a planer such as this one. I bought it for one reason only to find out that it can be used for many projects! I would tell a friend to buy one of these as well.
customer_reviews.author: advidhunter

customer_reviews.title: Well made light duty planer
customer_reviews.text: I have a large 7" planer I use for slabs. I bought this one for lighter jobs and it works great for that. Clean accurate cuts and easy to manage due to its relatively light weight. Its now my go to planer for 80% of my work. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life ezer.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my life ezer. Have used to plane doors window frames, cedar 2x8s for a sign. Work great every time I used it. Just need to watch the front handle dept. gauge when using it, other then that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Frost

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the planer - 2 for the case
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the carrying case is cumbersome as you have to completely disassemble your edge guide to put it away. I'll end up making my own case. The planer works great.
customer_reviews.author: LarryVT

customer_reviews.title: Best Planer for the money and it's not even close. 1A to Festool.
customer_reviews.text: Like all Bosch products I own, this is an exceptional product. Solid, accurate adjustment, amazing dust collection, unbelievably smooth, low vibration and almost no sound. I dont use this but maybe once or twice a week, but everytime I use it, I always say, " it's worth twice the price and i couldnt live without it."
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Great manual planer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, adjustments are accurate, used it to fix a door and planed it using the guide while the door remained seated. Worked great without problem. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Sahelijo

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: Like other users reported, the bottom of this had some quality control issues. there was some obvious marring on the bottom. I do not yet know if this will mess with the ability of this machine to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and cleared wood chips very easily. Only problem I notice is it's not very easy to change blades. I did get it changed, but it's an extremely tight fit
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McKitrick

customer_reviews.title: Great planner, Can't find on thing to complain about
customer_reviews.text: Great planner, Can't find on thing to complain about. Like that it comes with the 5 deg. spacer for doors. Like the case as well. The foot on the bottom is nice when you have a lot going on so you can set it down before the blade comes to a stop saves a lot of time in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: sdsr

customer_reviews.title: Like all Bosch tools I own
customer_reviews.text: Like all Bosch tools I own, this planer does the job better than any other. Bosch is just better at making tools the way pros need them. I would marry these guys if I could. Great stuff, but always buy the top of the line,
customer_reviews.author: Robert J McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: ... new doors that i was replacing old doors with easy to set up and work with works
customer_reviews.text: I have used the planer only once to plane some new doors that i was replacing old doors with easy to set up and work with works great
customer_reviews.author: Richard V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for doors and beyond.
customer_reviews.text: Had to hang some doors and couldn’t get my hands on a porter cable door planer. (They don’t make them anymore, those who know, know.) I bought this planer hoping it would help me get the job done and it worked like a charm. Can’t say it’s better than the $300-$500 discontinued porter cable planers but it got the job done and flawlessly. Great product, after all, it’s a Bosch!
customer_reviews.author: Isael Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tool to replace an identical one lost in TS Harvey. Very good planer and makes a smooth cut.
customer_reviews.author: JDE

customer_reviews.title: This is a great power tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great power tool! Go for this model rather than the less expensive one. It allows you to connect a vacuum to either side. Absolutely NO Dust is created if you have the vacuum attached. Pure Bosch quality.
customer_reviews.author: John in Amelia Island

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A great tool for on the goo, when you don't have your shop planer at your disposal.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Great hand planer
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to fix some doors. Easy to use and accurate depth cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Depth adjustment fast and accurate. Plane is easy to operate and produces a smooth cut.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not good product
customer_reviews.text: Died after using it for 15 minutes, had to send it off for repair. Not sure how it’s gonna turn out since it was smoking really bad with a burning electric smell
customer_reviews.author: Ashbey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Has all the features I need. Is very quiet and powerful. Should have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: REALLY nice
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, easy to use, and most of the dust and shavings end up in the bag, which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: I love this planer. I wish I would have got one of these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hondo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adjustment for side discharge is the best there is that I know of.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Easy adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Great planer. Very easy to accurately adjust. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Another great tool by Bosch
customer_reviews.text: Eliminates all the hand work involved with fitting doors, well worth the investment, a time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Bikerprophet

customer_reviews.title: Very good power, but was no owners manual
customer_reviews.text: Missing owners manual... I'm not a beginner, but have a lot to learn, so didn't want to get a table top planer yet. Like most power tools, it takes a little time to get familiar with the tool. It works pretty well, I just need more practice with it
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy rough planing. Depth of cut knob is fussy to set.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Bosch planer,it’s just ok,not for the serious wood worker
customer_reviews.text: Plenty power,blade chips very easily on hard wood,would not recommend for serious wood workers.its ok but not good for everyday worker.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool. I have never been disappointed in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. I have never been disappointed in a Bosch product. This one did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool as always from Bosch . . . works very nicely. Easily controllable and replacement blades can be had for not much $$
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It already broke . My husband used it several times and it has not lasted but a few months.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Having a two blade cutterhead makes a huge difference. Most electric hand planes have only one. The tersa type blades are a big improvement over HSS blades that need to be sharpened and adjusted when reinstalled.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bosch quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous tool. Excellent Bosch quality and design. Makes the door replacement job so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the start button be the front, not in the handle
customer_reviews.text: Starting it is very difficult, if the start button were in the front it will be very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I like Bosch tools
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a previous model. The old one was working fine but I just felt like having a new model. I gave the old model to my son for his growing tools collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed. Works amazing. If you're considering buying, this is the best choice by far.
customer_reviews.author: Yessie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and has met all tasks to date.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Trimmed a heavy door in less than 5 minutes. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: L.S.H. Lipari

customer_reviews.title: I love it, it works great
customer_reviews.text: Is worth what I paid for, I love it, it works great! Nice and smooth
customer_reviews.author: betoperez

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I used only once yet. But it is good to have it around. Have to do a few jobs to get it done right.
customer_reviews.author: RAMON ALVAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ.....so far! Should that change, I'll come back and annotate this. Happy planing.
customer_reviews.author: Rynoceros

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out tool. Powerful motor gets the job ...
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out tool. Powerful motor gets the job done and blades leave a smooth surface. I planed about 150 board feet of hard maple so I could sort boards by figure.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product - easy to use..solid feel - but light -..use the dust catcher - or you'll have a large cleanup job..
customer_reviews.text: Made short work of shaving a few 1/16ths off my shed door.. dust catcher has a tendency to slip off and the amount of shavings is incredible. worked perfectly.. great price and product. Especially like the twin guide rails..
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I had been using a manual planer. Wow. ...
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a manual planer. Wow ... this was a huge timesaver. The only challenge I had was that thick shavings tended to clog the unit once the bag filled up. The solution was simple: empty the bag more often!
customer_reviews.author: Fred81

customer_reviews.title: Clean cuts in the wood and the adjustments are well thought out and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to trim down doors in the house. Made quick work of it and the guide is particularly handy for the task. Clean cuts in the wood and the adjustments are well thought out and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product, did everything it said it would do. glass like finish on the cut.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mostly for planing paint off of the old doors in my old house. It works great for that, even when passing over the wood quite quickly. I can't imagine needing a higher model with two blades, which is a new feature for people who want to swap their carbide blades for high speed steel (HSS) blades. I think that having a single blade is actually a bit of an advantage when it comes to replacing the blade and there are actually quite a few planers from quite a few manufacturers whose blades are all interchangeable, so finding reasonable priced blades should never be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: The planner worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Item came as described, in the time stated. The planner worked great.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth ensman

customer_reviews.title: ) Great shavings for the fireplace tho'
customer_reviews.text: 20 doors and counting! (Invest in a vacuum attachment. The bag will last a couple of passes on a standard door before full.) Great shavings for the fireplace tho'!
customer_reviews.author: R. Howe

customer_reviews.title: I have a couple other Bosch tools that I am happy with that helped to influence my decision
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a worn out planner with this one. There are many brands and options, and I wrestled with which brand to purchase. I have a couple other Bosch tools that I am happy with that helped to influence my decision. This planner is much better than the entry model I've had for 15 years. It has plenty of power and cuts smoothly. The grip is comfortable and adjustment is easy and accurate. It collects chip debris well in the bag attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time user of power plane
customer_reviews.text: I had only ever planed by hand so this is the first power planer I've ever used and it really makes my woodworking faster and more enjoyable. It feels good in my hand. I like the ability to switch the chip exhaust from one side to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: You will be impressed
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought. Excellent motor, blade and dust bag, can't imagine the mess without it. Totally recommended
customer_reviews.author: Asony

customer_reviews.title: The small incremental depth adjustments are great. Durable carrying case
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. The small incremental depth adjustments are great. Durable carrying case. I've been using it just about every weekend for the last 3 weeks on DIY projects and have started to look around the house for more reasons to use it. I've planned a table, removed root from old fence planks to use as a headboard, squared a door frame...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Single blade under the hood FYI. No problems thus ...
customer_reviews.text: Single blade under the hood FYI. No problems thus far and have used it for a couple rough hours.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Linkh

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in Bosch
customer_reviews.text: Orderd 3 of these from Amazon. All three came with damaged and defective floor plates. Finally gave up on Bosch and went with a different brand. I contacted Bosch regarding the problem and they stated it is Amazon's problem. Very disappointed in Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The men in my family just love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift. The men in my family just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marti Miller

customer_reviews.title: I have almost no experience in woodworking or machining so the shoe might be fine. It just seems unfinished as the spots in ...
customer_reviews.text: Temporary review to post some pictures. I have almost no experience in woodworking or machining so the shoe might be fine. It just seems unfinished as the spots in the picture are slightly rougher than the other spots. There is also a slight rough spot in the middle of the cutting blade, can feel with fingernail. I haven't used it just in case this is unusual and I should return it.
customer_reviews.author: HRBGW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: planer has been working great as i have had one before that lasted me years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product by a great company. works perfect out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Boone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect tool for doing all our planing.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie G Powers

customer_reviews.title: better quality Bosch planer right here on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the money. It does the job and runs well. not for heavy commercial use. I mistook this for another, better quality Bosch planer right here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Graham

customer_reviews.title: heavy to try to use
customer_reviews.text: very heavy to try to use. parts missing in transit
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job for the price. The blades aren’t very durable, so buy spares. Make sure to attach a scrap piece to the exit end of the door or it will snipe the end horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Millrat

product_meta.title: Bosch 3-1/4 Inch Woodworking Hand Planer with Carrying Case, PL2632K
product_meta.description: Size:3-1/4" Planer with KitIndustry-first planer lock-off/lock-on button helps prevent accidental start-up and provides for extended operation. Dual-mount fence provides non-flexing guidance; prevents marring of door or work piece face. Spring-loaded, built-in stand elevates tool to protect blade(s) and save money. Powerful 6. 5 amp motor with 16, 500 RPM speed for fast stock removal. Dust ports are located on both sides of the tool to accommodate large shavings bag. Includes: (2) Wood razor Micro grain Blades, (1) Dual-Mount Guide Fence, (1) Straight No-Mar Plastic Overshoe for Fence, (1) 3-Degree No-Mar Plastic Overshoe for Fence, (1) Shavings Bag, (1) Blade Wrench and (1) Carrying Case.
feature_bullets: Power: the Bosch PL2632K Jointer Planer features a 6. 5 amp Planer and 16, 500 RPM speed for fast stock removal and smooth finish in soft and hard wood. Weighing only 6. 3 lbs. , This wood Planer provides power and efficiency in a lightweight tool
Convenient: our electric Planer is the first-ever power tool to have ambidextrous lock-off release button to help avoid accidental starts Plus a lock-on button for extended operation
Protection: features a spring-loaded stand to elevate tool and protect blade and tool resting spot. The PL2632K thickness Planer offers a special shape allowing for easy entry in middle of work piece
Accuracy: The aluminum front and rear shoes are precision-machined together for accuracy, and the tool has a machined groove for chamfering and sanding

Versatility: The versatile two-blade hand plane system can be converted for use with large high-speed steel blades (optional accessories required). The dual-mount guide fence can be mounted on either side of tool, and its plastic overshoe prevents marring of door or work-piece face

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars373 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
